author: Time
title: A Record 6.6 Million Seek U.S. Jobless Aid as Layoffs Mount
description: (WASHINGTON) — More than 6.6 million Americans applied for unemployment benefits last week, far exceeding a record high set just last week, a sign that layoffs are accelerating in the midst of the coronavirus. The job cuts are mounting against the backdrop of…
content:
(WASHINGTON) — More than 6.6 million Americans applied for unemployment benefits last week — doubling a record high set just one week earlier — a sign that layoffs are accelerating in the midst of the coronavirus.
The stunning report Thursday from the Labor … [+3780 chars]
